website_summaries.verdict: As long as the top is properly secured, this innovative container serves multiple purposes – dispenses and stores food without having to mess with pouring from the bag.
pros: Receives praise for unique bag-in design with "Bag Gripper Lid" handle, and pour spout that allows storage and dispensing without removing food from original bag
cons: If not closed tightly, top lid has the tendency to open during pouring, resulting in spills
Some reported that it's not completely airtight

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to look a little nicer / match my decor and so I ordered a nice laundry basket that the container would fit inside of
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold dog food. I wanted it to look a little nicer / match my decor and so I ordered a nice laundry basket that the container would fit inside of. I wanted to share in case anyone else was looking to do the same, as it was pretty difficult finding a large container and cute laundry basket with the right dimensions. This is the laundry basket I got (it fits perfectly!):
customer_reviews.author: Ken Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my dog's food
customer_reviews.text: I don't like leaving open bags of dog food. This canister is a perfect size for holding my dog's food. It can hold a 15 lb bah of Iams... just put the whole bag in. Or you can pour in a larger bag of food. It's really too big and heavy (when filled) to be able to use the pour spout. But the larger opening is perfect for using a scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, super tight, BPA plastic bin. It fits my cat's 22 pound bag of dry food perfectly. The hard part was getting the cover off to put the bag in. I called the company and within 10 minutes a representative called me back. She told me to pull up on one side on the end near the handle. I heard the 'pop' and the lid released. She then explained how to use the inside grip to hold the bag etc. Terrific customer service. I will be purchasing more items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  MTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: great for birdseed
customer_reviews.text: Full discosure: I'm obsessed with storage gadgets. This is no exception. I use it for those giant Costco boxes of bird seed, but it can't quite hold the hold thing at once. This doesn't really bother me since I was mainly looking for an easier way to pour the seeds into the dispenser. There's a handle on the back and another hold on the bottom that lets me lift and pour the thing relatively easy for how big it is. I don't have to ask a dude (or strong lady) to do it for me anymore so it's a lot more dignified and the spout works great.
customer_reviews.author: RachelMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing and stacking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of these - filled with a couple bags of wood pellets for a pellet-fueled grill. The handles are all in the right places for easy pouring and maneuvering. The pour spout, when it opens, is in mostly the right place. The two things I do not like about these bins: 1) the pour spout is really difficult to get open and left me with some busted and bruised fingernails 2) the inside lip blow the pour spout is pretty deep. This makes for a great hinge but also make the final pour very difficult. Size is great, lids are air tight, they sit and stack well, and keep my pellets nice and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Corns

customer_reviews.title: Spills all over when using pour spout
customer_reviews.text: purchased because of the pour spout. We store our cat food in this bin and then refill smaller containers that we keep in various locations around the house. The pour spout is situated in the part of the lid that lifts for you to scoop out whatever is inside the bin. Unfortunately, that part of the lid does not snap tight securely, so when we go to use the pour spout, that part pops open, spilling food everywhere. I think I will attempt to duct tape it closed, which will probably work but is not the idea. Wish it worked as featured right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: NikInCa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this container! It slides into and out of the bottom of my narrow pantry door and easily holds the 25.5 lb. bag of Science Diet cat food that I have on monthly auto-order from Amazon. I added a scoop. Really simplified my early morning cat-feeding routine. I can even manage it before coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Suzeanna

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money. Lol. No seriously its awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you buy large bags of pet food, do yourself a favor & buy this! No seriously, it's the best! I buy huge bags of dry cat food online & usually my cats dig at the outside of the bag not to mention we all know how much of a hassle it is to pour that out. I slip the entire bag into this container & open the spout, grab both handles & makes my life 90% easier. Cant tell you how much of my life I've wasted rolling up & clipping the large bag or moving it around the kitchen or trying to hide it in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Wheels would make it perfect
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for 11 bucks. Awesome deal. Bought a 38.5 pound bag of IAMs. Was able to put at least 30 pounds. Not sure how 30 pounds fit when description says only 20-22 pounds. Can’t complain. Has an easy and large top opening to scoop food out. Also includes a handle to easily pull it around. Only thing missing is a few small wheels. For the price, it’s the best dog food storage container on the market.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of box!
customer_reviews.text: This product came and right out of the box this thing does not close. How can I pour from the spout if this doesn’t lock into place? What a horrible first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Faris Jamil

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, however does not seal
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I purchase two of these one large one small. The small one is good, except the top will pop open sometimes. The large one that I am reviewing will not close at all. The concept of this item is to keep it contents * in this case cat food) dry and fresh away from the animals. This will not work for my needs. the top does not stay sealed no matter what I do. I can supply a picture if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Fellows

customer_reviews.title: excellent container for clean cat litter storage
customer_reviews.text: I like the spout but didn't realize I could also lift the same area and it would open to a wider size. I was very pleased that the container easily held 35 pounds of cat litter and the spout will really be beneficial when pouring it into the litter box. I think an additional handle on the other side would be even better to enable me to pour out the litter. I also think having a couple of wheels on the bottom would have made it easier to move around which is why I gave it a 4 star rating instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Meema

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight. Flap does not latch down.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bin well enough. 3 drawbacks. 1, and this would have been a deal breaker if I’d known, is the reach in flap doesn’t snap closed. It just lays on top of the rim. All my dog would have to do is knock it over and the dog food would be free flowing all over the floor, and lead to dangerous overeating, and bloat, and not exactly airtight. 2- I wish it were on wheels. 3- a little bigger would be better for my large bag of dog food. It’s a good buy if you don’t care about the food staying fresh for longer, and you don’t have dogs that will try and get in it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: beware the pour
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what I've been looking for. it fits in the space allowed. it seems airtight and fits a regular large bag of dog food (although that could be a bit heavy for some?) the lid comes all the way off. then there are 2 others ways to open the 'pour' area. the 'spout' on occasion when trying to shake the food out can make the other lid in same area to open and food goes everywhere!! obviously not ideal but I want to keep this as its everything else I need just need to be careful. I may figure out a way to make that one part stay closed forever (gorilla glue?) time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ACL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dog Food Storage
customer_reviews.text: This storage bin will keep your dog food fresh! It is air tight and holds a 30# bag of food easily. I don't use the pour feature much but opening the container and scooping the dog food out is easy and removal of the entire lid makes it easy to pour in a new bag without spilling. This is also a great way to bring dog food with you if you travel with your pets. I've had one of these for years and just purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: 50Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulk pet food
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and the lid is almost too secure. This is made with a thick plastick that is really sturdy. The handle seems to be in the correct spot and thick enough to not break while using. The lid has two spouts for pouring the food out which is great. This fits our bulk cat food awesome with no concerns for them getting into it. I will say the lid was a bit hard to get off but I guess that's a good thing to prevent them from getting into it.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great to store dog food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store bulk dog food. The lid stays secure, so I am able to actually poor things from it without fear of spilling. The opening on one end is large enough to put my hand in and fill a 3 cup measure with dog food and replace it without taking the entire top off. It is convenient and will purchase another to store my wood pellets for my pellet grill. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MFFJM

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the pet food storage container. One of my dogs has to eat science hill diet dog food. The only size they sell is 17.5 pound bag for $80. She is only 7 pounds so the bag of food last her for at least 7 months. I needed a good storage container to keep it fresh. It has a tight seal. I had to get my husband to open it because I couldn’t. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Watts & Sam

customer_reviews.title: The spout is worse than useless
customer_reviews.text: You can't put anything in it and use the pouring spout, as the weight of whatever is in there knocks the lid clean off and spills the contents all over the ground. Without heavy duty clips to hold the lid on the design is useless. I tried to use it twice and after losing 1/3 of the contents, ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it's cheap
customer_reviews.text: Does its job as far as being an airtight container. Unfortunately, mine came with the spout disfigured. I can't use it for pouring out food, only opening the larger part of the lid for scooping as it's now nearly impossible to open and close the spout without muscling through the bend shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Julie LB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and big!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Previous reviews talked about the lid not being tight and falling off. Either that's user error or I lucked out with one that's extremely snug. As far as the waterproof reviews.. I wouldn't assume it to be air and water tight when it has the fold out spout on top. Spout is tightly installed but no way to make that air or waterproof. Just common sense
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great after I figured it out
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very secure. For the reviews that said the lid wasn't secure, I really believe it was user error. It requires some force to push the lid down because of how tightly it snaps. Upon first use I did dump a bunch of bird seed on the floor because I hadn't pushed down on the lid enough to snap it down. Works great after I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight. Lid doesn’t snap shut.
customer_reviews.text: The lid didn’t snap shut on the first delivery I received. The part near the handle would push into the bin itself and pop back up. The pouring spout eventually snapped shut after I really pushed down hard to jam it on. So I returned for a replacement. Based on some of these reviews I’m not optimistic about getting a working product where the lids snaps shut. If it doesn’t work then the product is kind of useless since the lid would fall off under the weight of the contents inside the bin once you tip it over to pour said contents out.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box--Lid can't close
customer_reviews.text: The larger flip-open lid won't close all the way, even when applying lots of pressure. I didn't read reviews before purchasing because of its high overall rating. Looking through comments now though, it looks like many others have received it with this defect (some of them even giving it > 1 star w/this major defect ???), so I'm not going to request a replacement. I purchased a smaller version of this container a while back from a different store and it has not given me any problems, so I am super disappointed that their quality is so inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: perfect for birdseed storage in my closet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for storing birdseed and it is just the right. I put the lid on backwards so I can pull the container out of the closet easily and have quick access to dispensing. I already had one for dog food and do the same thing. I am thinking these would also be good for storing my potting soil types.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bonet

customer_reviews.title: My little furry beasts can't chew through this!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats who love their kibble.. they also like chewing holes into the side of the food bag.. because you know, mom won't notice that... So I looked around and found this giant container and for cheap! It is awesome! and my little kibble beasts can't chew through it. It's worth it, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wood pellet storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to store wood pellets for my grill. I was only expecting them to fit only one 20 pound bag in them but to my surprise, they could fit two 20 pound bags. They are very sturdy and the lid has a nice tight fit. My wife likes them much better than the buckets I had sitting around storing pellets in.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy with solid handle and pop up pour spout!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a couple months ago to put cat and dog food in. For the price I expected a cheap plastic container. What arrived was very very well built, has multiple options to access food as well as a pop up pour spout and a heavy duty handy for pouring food directly out of the container. These are quite large so make sure you check the dimensions of where you are going to keep them. They fit great in the bottom of my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda O'Haleck

customer_reviews.title: Good Container, Lid doesn’t lock down though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dog food holder and certainly does it’s job. The only component that didn’t quite work out for me was the pouring spout built into the holder.. The lid does not lock in for me, so whenever I tried to use the pouring spout the lid came off rather easily and food spilled everywhere. So I will only use my scoop that I placed inside the container. Otherwise I love how it fits perfectly in the kitchen without taking up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorrgirl01

customer_reviews.title: Dog food keeper, better than just the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Dog food bag fits perfectly and even added in rest of another bag 3/4’s empty. Easy to scoop out. More organized too. Not sure how fresh it will keep but the lid does close tightly. When the bag starts to get close to the bottom I will see how it pours.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and quantity
customer_reviews.text: 3 of these and life is now complete. I've wanted storage for so long and now I have it! They are incredibly sturdy and the handle and bottom hand scoop make for smart thinking. Also like the top scoop/flip open because my kids dont make a mess trying to pour! Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: TacoSparkle

customer_reviews.title: Nice container!
customer_reviews.text: The container is great, as advertised. My only grievances is with UPS, who simply left the package on my front porch, and the box was 1/2 open. Leaving a package right here in Philadelphia unattended is an invitation to a stolen package within 30 minutes, Way to go UPS!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this food container. The lid closes good and tight so our dogs food will stay safe and secure. The top opening is large enough for me to easily get her food scooped out. Much nicer than having a big dogfood bag that doesn't seal shut. It also is easy to store right behind her water bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Petfect container! Exactly what we needed! Wish I’d bought it a long time ago! We can set the bag in the container. The top is set up so that you can pour or scoop the food out. My husband said it was the best thing I’d bought in quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, pour spout, capacity.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, filled it with a bag of Traeger wood pellets for my smoker, love the pour spout, perfect. Thanks for manufacturing and offering a high quality storage container, I will be purchasing more of them!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent store and pour!
customer_reviews.text: Love these storage containers! I use 1 for bird seed and the other for cat food. They make it super simple to store and pour. They are made of sturdy plastic..not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mama5b

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but light and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: this has been rock solid. The material is heavy and feels very sturdy, it has great handholds, including one on the bottom to help when it tips. The spout works great for precision pouring and it holds almost an entire bag of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: NaNa Na NaNa

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Design For My Room
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a container to hold my dry cat food for some time. I don't have much room so I wanted something that was taller, but still looked nice. This fit the bill. Great price and easy to use. The only thing I wish it had was rollers on the bottom so I could move it around easier. Since I like to keep changing were I store things. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Krueger

customer_reviews.title: The whole brand new bag of dog kibble fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed, and I'm going to buy another. The whole brand new bag of dog kibble fit (minus one meal my dog wanted right then) and the design makes it super easy to lift and pour. Now I need one for my bird food!
customer_reviews.author: SunnySucculentsSD

customer_reviews.title: Good large storage/dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for storing sunflower seeds for the birds. Won't quite hold a 40 Pound bag of black oil sunflower seeds. Works vert well to refill a smaller dispenser that I keep in the house. This is too large to fill the bird feeder, works great to fill the smaller dispenser about once a week. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Loges

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase to hold kitty litter and it does a great job. The litter itself is very heavy but this has a handle and makes it much easier to maneuver it also has a lid that closes shut so the cats do not disturb it. Overall a great Buy would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I love this container for my cats food it makes it very easy to pour into our automatic feeder. It fits a whole 50 pound bag of the cat food which we just poured straight in there and were able to throw the bag away which is why we bought this container. So we did have a big bag of opened food out in our house it makes the area look much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Joga

customer_reviews.title: Hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great container for your 25 pound sack of flour plus there's room for a couple of 3-5 pound bags of rye and wheat. If it had wheels, it would get 5 stars from me. Very happy with it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: mimistan

customer_reviews.title: Using for rock salt
customer_reviews.text: Holds about 60 pounds of rock salt with an opening big enough to get a scoop through. Much better than trying to keep the salt dry in the bag. I wouldn't want to roll it around a lot with that much weight in it, but if you plan to keep it in one spot, as I do, then this works great. Update: Held up great all winter long. Rock salt stayed nice and dry. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: webmonkee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bird seed!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I'm using it in the garage for bird seed storage. It's very sturdy. I love the handle and the pouring spout. Very well made and a nice size clear container.
customer_reviews.author: Jrc85

customer_reviews.title: Sure would be nice if the lid with the pour spout closed securely or at all
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have owned. I loved the one I had. Identical in every way.... except that scoop lid (what the pour lid is in) does not snap closed. It just closes with no holding mechanism. The old one did and held very well. I discovered this not so small issue when trying to use the pour spout and - Surprise! - Half of the full container was on the
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Land

customer_reviews.title: So much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a second to figure out what flipped open where, but we got a full 22 lb bag in it no problem and it’s been a million times easier than using the bag to scoop food! Even has a nice handle to help with picking it up. Idk if I would pick it up and pour it personally, but it’s built sturdy I think it could handle it. Won’t be using the bag ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Seals well
customer_reviews.text: I have one for dog food and one on my back porch for bird seed. Easy to use and, so far, the squirrels haven’t the bird seed! With a lot of rain recently, I’ve found that the seed remains bone dry and I like that!
customer_reviews.author: Lela Wiedeman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love it. Keeps the food nice and fresh and nice and clean. Probably going to buy a second one for the second pet. The flip top is really handy and makes it easy to scoop out the perfect amount.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonG

customer_reviews.title: Best Food Container
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. I use them for my cat food, bunny food and flour. I like that there are multiple option sizes to dispense the food. (Big and small spout.) They are very heavy duty, great quality. Would buy again. You won't regret getting this container.
customer_reviews.author: SBurrell

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 25 lb & larger bags of black oil sunflower seeds
customer_reviews.text: This was WAY smaller than I expected it to be. I use it for bird seed (black oil sunflower seeds) and it was difficult for me to determine how many pounds of bird seed equals the 32 quarts in this container. Well...I was wrong (so I'm not dinging them any stars due to my miscalculation). Years ago, I bought the larger one from Sam's Club and it was perfect (and has since dry-rotted). This one doesn't work well for the large bags I buy.
customer_reviews.author: dosbirn

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the lid.
customer_reviews.text: The container is basically fine, and works best for us not by using the pour spout but by opening the larger hinged cover. If we do try pouring food out with this product, we find (we found, much our chagrin) that the lid easily pops open creating a mess to clean up. In short, the larger lid does not latch closed very well. So we will just use that same larger hinged lid, open it to scoop out food, and close it again. The bin is in a closet, so can keep "fido" away from it easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: Toozie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. Durable. Reasonably priced for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these so far. One we use for dog food and one we use for driveway salt out in the garage. Both seem to be extremely durable and work great. I may even purchase a couple more for squirrel and bird food.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Will hold alot of cat food
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my cat food. I normally buy 13 lbs at a time but found out this container will hold 26 lbs if the food is small and you do a little shaking. Easy to move around when needed and a 4 cup plastic measuring cup fits in the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Tineza

customer_reviews.title: Easy access without taking up too much room
customer_reviews.text: Life changer! I was using the big 20lb bag of Wellness kibbles with raw pieces and I didn’t like the idea of not being able to seal the bag closed. I can pour the entire bag into this container and still have a little room left, which I perfect to mix in more raw turkey pieces because my husky loves those! I love that this container doesn’t take up too much room and it definitely keeps the food more fresh. Easy accessibility with the two openings at the top. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing large bags of cat food. Having three cats means saving money as much as possible. Being able to buy large bags of cat food with a bug free place to store them is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joan Burke

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Use it for dog food, served its purpose and the dogs can’t get into it all the while I feel it keeps the food fresh longer. I actually have 2 of them for dog food and another for all my daughters pets hay/food.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options!  Easy to dispense!  LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Holds big bag of cat food and it's easy to dispense, even into a small self-feeding cat container. Love the finger hold on the bottom of the container. And if you want to use a scoop instead, you can, because you can use the flip top part instead of the pouring dispenser. Lots of options. I'm getting one to hold charcoal next.
customer_reviews.author: XBoomslang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Very essential for pet owners!! Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Update: it's been 3 years and mine is still in great condition! I keep cat food in it! It's still perfect and I still love it! Awesome purchase! I have had mine for well over a year now and I have to say I still love it! I keep cat food in it. It's made very well. I love the convenience of it, all the different ways to feed, different ways to access the food. Love the handle on the side and place on bottom to grab. It's just a really well made and thought out product. Wish everyone out there would put this much thought into their products!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel 519

customer_reviews.title: Very pour design, lids won’t stay closed!
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed. Filled the container up with dog food and opened the small spot to pour the food into the dog bowl and the larger door that surrounds the spout just popped open and dumped a bunch of dog food all over the floor. The larger door opens with the slightest amount of pressure. The small spout is totally worthless due to that. Pretty much junk to us know. Just a plain storage container without the ability to pour out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its serve its purpose for my cat food. Its maybe a little to heavy if you fill it up with cat food if your not strong enough to lift it and pour. Its does feel airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gallego

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing the Kon Mari method around my house and I needed to finally do something about our cats food. What bothered me (and hurt like crap!) Trying to open the spout cracked and broke one of my nails and it bleed! Other than opening that pain in the behind....I'd order this again
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product . . .
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of great quality, and the size is much larger than expected. I'm a very satisfied customer! I don't doubt that it is airtight, but will update if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our cat and dog foods. No more pets ripping through bags. Love the spout to easily pour. Or accessible lid to open and scoop if ya needed. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Gypsy Decor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to pour
customer_reviews.text: Pretty convenient for keeping cat litter in easy to pour container. It would probably be pretty heavy if filled to the top though. I use Precious Cat Ultra Premium clumping cat litter in the 40-pound bag (I highly recommend this litter too!). One bag fills this about 2/3 of the way. So I can add a new bag to the remains of an old bag and still have room in this. Anyway, easy to pour and store in the closet, with less risk of it spilling over.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: cheaper than at the pet stores
customer_reviews.text: i'm glad i looked here before i went to a pet store for this. there were more choices, and the prices were much better. very sturdy, and i like how the top opens for easy pour and the handle to lift it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ann Rusch

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and you can NOT beat this price. I needed something to put the dog food in so it's not spilling everywhere. This arrived literally the day after I ordered it, (a little over-packaged), but this is dog-proof. It's perfect. It opens easily and has two openings at the top, one to pour and one to reach in and scoop food out. I am so glad I found this. EDIT: Many months later and this is still holding strong. Love it. EDITED AGAIN: A couple of years later and still like new. Keeps dog food secured. I just wipe it down every so often and it looks new again.
customer_reviews.author: Freedomride

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this product to hold cat litter. It makes it extremely easy to pour and top off litter boxes without any of the hassles that you get trying to pour litter directly from a 40lb bag. .
customer_reviews.author: TarHeel87

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet food storage.
customer_reviews.text: Sized right to slide whole bag of dog food right in so no clean up later. Rectangular shape fit perfectly beside dryer machine. Lid closes well, opens at a touch. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Y.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, unfortunately the lid went back a little too far and doesn't secure food as well. Would buy another one and be a little more careful next time
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that works
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product with great results this is our second one to buy the first one lasted for over 10 years. Would definitely recommend five stars
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have a lab and this is the perfect size for a 15 lb bag of dogfood. The mice are not happy as they no longer can get at the dog food. Love having the choice of being able to use a scoop or just pouring the dog food. I am considering getting a smaller one for storing flour.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Using these for smoker pellets and not dog food and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: Great food storage container. Holds a ton and keeps it fresh. It’s sturdy and durable. The lid works well and the handle makes handling it easy
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: We'll designed
customer_reviews.text: Holds large bags of pet food, as described. The lid is designed well - you can open a pour spout to tip/pour, or open a flap to scoop food out. The handle is large and makes it easy to lift/move.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is sturdy with the tightest seal I have had on a dog food container. Only have had it for a short time but love it so far......
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Fits 15lb Bag With Ample Room to Spare
customer_reviews.text: This container fits the 15 lb bag with room to spare and I can scoop easily through the flap. It would be a little large/bulky for me to pour the food through the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great option for dog food storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog food storage bin. It holds our usual 18lb bag of kibble perfectly and does a great job of keeping it fresh. The slim design is perfect for keeping it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT BUT A LITTLE AWKWARD FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: I think this bin is made well. The only thing I should have done prior to purchasing is measure to make sure it fit well in my cabinet. It fits but its awkward so I have to pull it out to use. It is somewhat deep so its difficult to reach in when you get to the last of your food. The pouring feature is nice but I have 3 dogs and I measure their food. Just FYI but overall I think it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two containers. One of them worked properly and one did not (the lid did not snap shut). I returned the container only to find that the replacement had the same defect. I thought I would try once more and ordered a replacement, only to get another defective container. At this point, I realized it didn’t make sense to keep trying for a working container. I ended up going to a local pet store to find the second dispenser (albeit a different, less intricate style) to serve the function that I needed. Would not purchase from this company again and would advise buyers to steer clear on the basis of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Great container for my puppy's food
customer_reviews.text: Great container for my puppy's food. Seems to be pretty air-tight as he never sniffs at it when the lid is closed. I open the lid to scoop out his food and it easily fits his 20lb natures domain puppy food bag. The first container that I received didn't close properly so I issued a return and was sent a replacement which arrived in 2 days so very happy with customer service! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Orchidees

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog food!
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple containers for our dogs and they work great for holding the large bags until we refill smaller containers for daily use. They're the ideal choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rattlesnake transport container. Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Great Pet Food Container but I use it to transport rattlesnakes into the wild. The narrow and high walls make it difficult for them to jump just right out again. I drilled air holes into the lid that snaps nice and tight on. The hight also makes it hard for them to try to escape by pushing the lid. So far non did if I got it in the container in the first place. To dump them out is easy and safe too by opening just half of the lid. Very useful and much cheaper on Amazon than in the local petstore. Probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Kraut

customer_reviews.title: Love This Container
customer_reviews.text: Love this container! We feed a couple stray cats on our acreage and this container makes storage and use so easy and convenient. I like being able to keep the food fresh, out of the way and so easy to pour the larger bag of food (which also cuts down on the food cost).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Bug free
customer_reviews.text: I guess the only thing I would say negatively about it is that when the plastic is moulded the food gets caught, so you have to tap that out by hitting the plastic with your hand or another object to dislodge the food. Other than that it keeps the food fresh and bug free
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LEAVE OUTSIDE!!! Squirrels chewed it!
customer_reviews.text: So we wanted to love this and initially did. Lid and spout closed super tight and were in fact hard to open! Then based on some reviews and answered questions we decided to put it out on our patio (we are using it for birdseed). Next morning we found the lid around the spout completely chewed through !!!! Most likely by our fat backyard squirrel! We are shocked at this but just wanted to warn other people!
customer_reviews.author: M.S

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, my wife says its too heavy. You can still access the dog food through a large hole on the top - my wife's preferred method. I like grabbing the whole thing and dumping it into the food bowl. 10/10 would buy again. I'm thinking about getting one of these to store my charcoal/wood for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these for many years, same style,same brand , different color lid. It lasted many years before it broke and we had to replace so I am hoping this new one will last a good long time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dea

customer_reviews.title: Not Airtight
customer_reviews.text: I got this container for cat food. I bought this item because I needed something airtight to keep ants out. After using it for a few months, the ants invaded and got into the container -- ruining a 22lb bag of food. I just wanted to write this review to warn others and help save money. Thankfully I was quickly refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexiaksp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food container
customer_reviews.text: You can fit the whole bag of dog food or simply empty it into this container. Works great. is very sturdy, very well built. I own 2 and may buy more once I have more animals.
customer_reviews.author: GinaC

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction! Lid snaps on hard and the built in pouring spout is really nice. Great for keeping the dog food in the garage and keeping the rodents out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: It's a dog food container...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the the dog food smell in and the ants and roaches out! I have no idea who would be strong enough to pour a 32 quart container of kibble accurately, so why there's a pour spout is kind of lost on me, but it doesn't interfere with it's main function, which again, is to keep the dog food smell in and the ants and roaches out. It's also nice to have a really good idea of when the hound is going to run out of chow so you can prevent that crisis (it's all about life's little victories!).
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were waterProof to store our bird seed outside. They definitely are not waterptoof, so need to be stored inside.
customer_reviews.author: tntrocks!

customer_reviews.title: Saves money!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something bigger to hold dry dog food for my dogs. This is perfect. Holds multiple small bags of food or 2 medium size bags. Now I buy dog food every 3 weeks instead of every week. Saves me money
customer_reviews.author: Hicks246

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Container
customer_reviews.text: The slimness makes a great fit, the lid is tight and secure, the handle robust and well placed to pour without spilling everywhere. Can't speak to durability yet but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: seal is not tight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for birdseed, and wanted to be able to keep on my back porch. I am very careful about shutting it tight, but a persistent squirrel found it, and chewed open the pour spout and helped himself to my seed. I would like to get a replacement lid, but it doesn't look like it is available. I guess it's not as durable as I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Terra D. Gallaway

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food fresh
customer_reviews.text: This product was larger then I expected but I didn’t check the measurements beforehand. It works perfect for my small breed dog food. I use their dog bowls and scoop the food directly from the container rather then pour it. It’s easy to clean if needed and keeps my dogs food fresh. I would recommend this for owners of any breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 cats (mainly outdoors), and I've been keeping their dry food in a big ol' covered 5 gallon bucket for 15 yrs. or more. The top hasn't fit it in years, so the food was not staying as fresh as I'm sure the cats would prefer, and the bucket took up a good deal of room in the laundry room. This fits the bill - I love the fact that there's a tight lid on it, a spout for pouring when I'm putting food in their bowls outside, but I can also lift the smaller lid and scoop the food out w/ a cup. And its size & shape makes it a better fit next to the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Becky in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Lid is loose and creates spills
customer_reviews.text: Lid doesn’t fit securely The lid is loose and doesn’t lock securely onto the container. I can’t use the pour feature because when I do the whole lid pops off and food spills out all over.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: After 1 Day!
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with 20 lbs of bird seed and placed the container on my balcony next to my hanging bird feeder. The top covers were pressed down fully and air tight. So the next day, about 20 hours later, I go out and see this massive gash. I do back to woods. My feathered pals ignored the feeder and violently pecked a hole right thru the thick plastic top. CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP says my birds!
customer_reviews.author: Max The Springer

product_meta.title: Large (Up to 22lb) Fresh Dry Dog & Cat Food Plastic Storage Container With Flip Lid & Pour Spout For Pet Food, and Bird Seed, BPA Free by Buddeez
product_meta.description: Heavy-duty unit for the bigger bags. 8-gallon storage dispenser works with up to 22 lb. bags of dog food, 25 lbs. of cat food or 32 lb. bird seed bags. Convenient handle makes pouring easy from any size bag. Patented "Bag-Gripper Lid" seals contents inside the original bag - yet allows for easy pouring. Dual-Pour Flip Top provides two ways to pour.
feature_bullets: Bag-In features allows dispensing of seed or food from the original bag while maintaining nutritional information
BPA Free, FDA-approved food contact safe resin.
No bugs! No spills! No mess!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
